snippet: The retailing giant is expected to announce that on March 26 it will begin allowing customers to convert their old games into credits in over 3,100 Walmart stores nationwide.
abstract: Walmart is expected to announce that it will begin allowing customers to convert their old games into credits in over 3,100 Walmart stores nationwide.
lead_paragraph: The retailing giant is expected to announce that on March 26 it will begin allowing customers to convert their old games into credits in over 3,100 Walmart stores nationwide.

headline.main: Walmart to Offer Customers Credit for Used Video Games
headline.print_headline: Walmart to Offer Customers Credit for Used Video Games
